title: PIN-based Authentication Success
description: Verify user can authenticate successfully using a valid PIN and is redirected to the appropriate role-based dashboard with session established.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter a valid PIN for a waiter user
Submit PIN for authentication
User is authenticated and redirected to Waiter Dashboard
Session is maintained and valid for duration

title: PIN-based Authentication Failure with Invalid PIN
description: Verify system rejects invalid PINs and prevents access with appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter an invalid or non-existent PIN
Submit PIN for authentication
Authentication fails and error message is displayed
Access to any dashboard is denied

title: Role-based Dashboard Access Control
description: Verify users see only authorized sections per their roles and protected routes prevent unauthorized access.

steps.description: Authenticate as a Kitchen staff user
Attempt to navigate to Admin Dashboard route via direct URL
Access is denied and user is redirected or shown unauthorized message
Verify Kitchen Dashboard loads correctly with only kitchen category orders

title: Real-time Order Status Updates via WebSocket
description: Verify that order creation and status updates propagate in real-time to relevant dashboards using WebSocket.

steps.description: Waiter creates a new order for a table with kitchen and bar category items
Kitchen dashboard receives and displays new kitchen category items instantly
Bar dashboard receives and displays new bar category items instantly
Kitchen staff updates order item status to IN_PROGRESS and READY
Waiter dashboard sees updated item statuses in real-time

title: Order Creation and Lifecycle Management
description: Test complete order lifecycle including creation, status progression, cancellation with reasons, serving, and completion.

steps.description: Waiter selects a table and adds categorized menu items to cart
Submit the order to create it in the system
Order appears as PENDING with correct details in Kitchen and Bar Dashboards
Kitchen staff marks order items IN_PROGRESS and then READY
Kitchen staff cancels an order item with a cancellation reason
Cancellation is logged with correct reason; canceled items move to history
Waiter marks ready orders as served and can move tables
Table status updates accordingly and order lifecycle progresses properly

title: Menu Management Full CRUD Operations
description: Verify Admin can create, read, update, and delete menu items including handling campaign menu groups.

steps.description: Admin navigates to menu management section
Create a new menu item with category 'kitchen'
New menu item appears correctly in the menu list
Update the price and description of an existing menu item
Menu item updates reflect accurately across all relevant dashboards
Create a campaign menu grouping multiple items
Campaign menu displays correctly and allows ordering as grouped item
Delete a menu item and verify it no longer appears
Deleted items cannot be selected or ordered

title: Table Management and Status Tracking
description: Verify visual 20-table layout, status tracking updates, and table transfer operations function correctly.

steps.description: Waiter views the visual table layout
All 20 tables display with correct initial statuses (empty or occupied)
Create an order for a table and verify status changes to pending
Complete and serve the order, verify table status updates accordingly
Perform a table transfer from one table to another
Table statuses update and order associations transfer correctly

title: Payment Processing for Cash and Card with Discount Application
description: Verify cashier can process payments via cash and card, apply discounts, and payment history logs correctly.

steps.description: Cashier selects a table with an active order
Apply a discount to the bill
Select payment type as cash and complete payment
Payment completes successfully, table resets to empty, and payment history logs the transaction
Repeat process selecting card payment type
Card payment processed correctly and logged

title: Reporting Accuracy and Data Integrity
description: Verify live revenue updates, daily/weekly/monthly reports, top products, payment breakdowns, and staff sales are accurate.

steps.description: Admin views live revenue and sales reports on dashboard
Reported revenue matches sum of completed payments
Verify daily, weekly, and monthly analytics reports generate correctly
Reports reflect correct sales figures per time period
View sales breakdown per staff and payment method
Breakdowns accurately represent underlying data

title: Staff Management: Add and Delete Staff with PIN
description: Verify Admin can add new waiter or cashier staff with PIN registration and delete existing staff securely.

steps.description: Admin navigates to staff management section
Create a new waiter staff account with a unique PIN
New staff member appears in staff list and can authenticate with new PIN
Delete an existing cashier staff member
Deleted staff member can no longer authenticate or access system

title: Data Persistence and JSON File Integrity
description: Verify that all CRUD operations on users, menus, orders, and completed orders persist correctly to JSON files without data corruption.

steps.description: Perform CRUD operations on menu items, orders, and staff
Inspect relevant JSON files on the server (users.json, menu.json, orders.json, completed-orders.json)
All JSON files reflect changes accurately and data consistency is maintained
No data loss, corruption, or concurrency issues observed during simultaneous transactions

title: Routing and Navigation with Protected Routes
description: Verify React Router enforces route protection, redirects unauthorized users, and navigation works correctly per role.

steps.description: Login as waiter and navigate to Waiter Dashboard
Attempt direct access to Admin Dashboard URL
User is redirected to login or unauthorized page
Log out and attempt to access any protected route
Redirected to login page
Login as admin and switch user roles using role switch feature
Dashboard content and routes update accordingly with no access leaks
